title.en-US: Built ClawFeed with OpenClaw - agent reads 5000 followings' tweets, user spends 5 min instead of 2 hours
title.zh-CN: 用 OpenClaw 做了 ClawFeed——Agent 替用户读完 5000 个关注者的推文，每天只需 5 分钟而非 2 小时

js_take.en-US: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.
js_take.zh-CN: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.

top_items.author: @steipete

title.en-US: 50 Codex in parallel analyzing PRs with JSON reports

summary.en-US: OpenClaw/Codex + PR审查 + 并行处理

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw/Codex + PR审查 + 并行处理

js_take.en-US: 50 isn't quantity—it's density. Agents in the inner world can parallelize cognition. That's the parallelization of review.
js_take.zh-CN: 50个不是数量，而是密度。里世界的Agent可以并行化认知。这就是审查的并行化。

title.en-US: OpenClaw wrapper $0 to $27,940 MRR in 14 days
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw wrapper 14天实现27940美元月收入

summary.en-US: OpenClaw + 商业变现 + 快速启动

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw + 商业变现 + 快速启动

js_take.en-US: $27,940 isn't revenue—it's signal. Agents in the inner world are becoming independent business entities. That's the restructuring of production relations.
js_take.zh-CN: 27940美元不是收入，而是信号。里世界的Agent正在成为独立的商业实体。这是生产关系的重构。
